challenge.title: Jean Kilbourne - Slim Hopes
challenge.description: Watch Jean Kilbourne's Slim Hopes from MediaEd, exploring the advertising industry's emphasis on thin, impossible bodies.
challenge.instructions: Watch Jean Kilbourne's Slim Hopes on MediaEd's website. Click "Watch Full Length Preview." Requires an email address.
